definitions.definition: To eject from a boat , submarine , aircraft , spaceship or hot-air balloon , so as to lighten the load.
examples: The ballooners had to jettison all of their sand bags to make it over the final hill.

definitions.definition: To let go or get rid of as being useless or defective .

main_definition: To eject from a boat , submarine , aircraft , spaceship or hot-air balloon , so as to lighten the load.
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) To let go or get rid of as being useless or defective .
